testimonials.name: Ahmed Hassan
testimonials.content: InvestPro's AI recommendations helped me grow my portfolio by 22% in just 8 months. The platform is incredibly user-friendly and the customer support is outstanding.

testimonials.name: Fatima Khan
testimonials.content: As a woman entrepreneur, I was hesitant about investing. InvestPro's educational content and robo-advisor made it so simple. My retirement fund has grown significantly.

testimonials.name: Dr. Ali Raza
testimonials.content: The Shariah-compliant investing options are exactly what I was looking for. InvestPro ensures all my investments align with my Islamic values while delivering excellent returns.

testimonials.name: Sarah Ahmed
testimonials.content: Started with just PKR 5,000 monthly SIP. Two years later, my portfolio is worth over PKR 200,000. The compound growth is amazing!

successStories.title: From PKR 10K to PKR 500K
successStories.description: Young professional doubles investment in 18 months
